title: can you guys seriously top banning darius?
body: honestly, he isnt that strong anymore... Q+E nerf really hurt him. like it hurt ALOT. he is a full blown cripple now.

replies.body: LOL, any decent darius play can tell you this "nerf" didn't affect him at all.

> LOL, any decent darius play can tell you this "nerf" didn't affect him at all.

his winrate dropped from 52% to 47%. thats not affecting him lol?

you really think people are going to stop banning him? Lmao
